<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBox x:Name="TitleTextBox" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" FontSize="20" Margin="5" Padding="20" VerticalAlignment="Center" Text="Lorem Ipsum" TextAlignment="Center" /> <StackPanel Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="1" > <TextBox x:Name="TextBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="10" /> <ListBox x:Name="ListBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="10" SelectionChanged="ListBoxWithData_OnSelectionChanged" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1"> <Button x:Name="AddButton" Content="Add" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="AddButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="SeriesButton" Content="Series" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="SeriesButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DeleteButton" Content="Delete" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DeleteButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DrawButton" Content="Draw" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DrawButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="Repeat" Content="Repeat" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="RepeatButtonOnClick" /> </StackPanel> <Canvas x:Name="MainCanvas" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="1" Margin="5" Height="300" VerticalAlignment="Top" Background="White" ClipToBounds="True"> <Canvas.LayoutTransform> <ScaleTransform ScaleX="1" ScaleY="-1" CenterX=".5" CenterY=".5" /> </Canvas.LayoutTransform> </Canvas>.../>
<<TextBox x:Name="TextBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="10" /> <ListBox x:Name="ListBoxWithData" Margin="5" Padding="10" SelectionChanged="ListBoxWithData_OnSelectionChanged" />.../>

<<Button x:Name="AddButton" Content="Add" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="AddButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="SeriesButton" Content="Series" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="SeriesButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DeleteButton" Content="Delete" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DeleteButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="DrawButton" Content="Draw" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="DrawButtonOnClick" /> <Button x:Name="Repeat" Content="Repeat" Margin="5" Padding="10" Click="RepeatButtonOnClick" />.../>

<<Grid Background="LightGray"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <StackPanel Grid.Row = "0" Orientation = "Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center"> <Button Content = "PieChart" Padding = "10 3 10 3" Margin = "10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PieChartButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Normalized Histogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="NormalizedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="StackedHistogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="StackedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Plot" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PlotButtonOnClic" IsEnabled=""/> </StackPanel> <Button Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Content = "Exit" Padding = "10 3 10 3" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="ExitButtonOnClick"/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <StackPanel Grid.Row = "0" Orientation = "Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center"> <Button Content = "PieChart" Padding = "10 3 10 3" Margin = "10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PieChartButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Normalized Histogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="NormalizedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="StackedHistogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="StackedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Plot" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PlotButtonOnClic" IsEnabled=""/> </StackPanel> <Button Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Content = "Exit" Padding = "10 3 10 3" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="ExitButtonOnClick"/>.../>

<<Button Content = "PieChart" Padding = "10 3 10 3" Margin = "10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PieChartButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Normalized Histogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="NormalizedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="StackedHistogram" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="StackedHistogramButtonClick"/> <Button Content="Plot" Padding="10 3 10 3" Margin="10" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="PlotButtonOnClic" IsEnabled=""/>.../>
